sentence.text: GRACILE syndrome is a rare autosomal recessive disease characterized by fetal growth retardation, Fanconi cardiac muscle tissue development aminoaciduria, cholestasis, iron overload, profound lactic acidosis, and early death.

Mitochondrial disorders are an extremely heterogeneous group of diseases sharing, in common, the transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter that they all ultimately impair the function of the mitochondrial respiratory chain.

entity.text: transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter
